casebody.data:
Bruce RHYNE and Janice Rhyne, H/W, Petitioners
v.
UNITED STATES STEEL CORPORATION SUNOCO, INC. (R & M) f/k/a Sun Company, Inc. and f/k/a Sun Oil Company, Inc. Radiator Specialty Company ExxonMobil Corporation Chevron USA, Inc. as Successor in Interest to Gulf Oil Company Safety-Kleen Systems, Inc., CRC Industries, Inc. Univar USA, Inc. f/k/a Chemcentral Corp., and Van Waters & Rodgers, Inc. Ashland, Inc. Kano Laboratories, Inc.The Steco Corporation Acuity Specialty Products Group, Inc. The Savogran Company Turtle Wax, Inc., Individually and as Successor in Interest to Marvel Oil Company Inc., Respondents No. 116 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 5, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 5th day of September, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
